Results
===============

On the Jumpbox select the Putty icon on the desktop, and open asm1.site1.example.com

.. image:: /_static/class3/waf_open_putty.png

.. image:: /_static/class3/waf_ping_bigip.png

#. From asm1.site1 ping the gateway

   * ping 10.1.50.1

#. From asm1.site1 ping bigip1.site1 and bigip2.site1

   * ping 10.1.50.2
   * ping 10.1.50.3

#. From **asm1.site2** ping the gateway

   * ping 10.1.60.1

#. From asm1.site2 ping bigip1.site2 and bigip2.site2

   * ping 10.1.60.2
   * ping 10.1.60.3
